3734MAX.summary: Majestic’s 35-7505 Cut-Less Korplex® glove combines A5 cut protection with a premium polyurethane palm, delivering superior dexterity, grip, and touchscreen capability for safer, more efficient work when compared to the 3734MAX.
3734MAX.whyMajestic: Majestic’s 35-7505 Cut-Less Korplex® glove can handle sharp materials like metal, glass, tiles, and blades as well as 3734MAX, but its ultra-thin 18-gauge Korplex® knit keeps workers more agile. Lightweight and form-fitting, it reduces hand fatigue for all-day comfort. The premium polyurethane palm provides a secure, durable grip and touchscreen capability to keep workers connected. Recognized as the 2023 OH&S New Product of the Year, the 35-7505 helps worksites lower injury risk, maintain consistent glove use, and get more value from their PPE.

Lightweight and form-fitting, it reduces hand fatigue for all-day comfort. The premium polyurethane palm provides a secure, durable grip and touchscreen capability to keep workers connected. Recognized as the 2023 OH&S New Product of the Year, the 35-7505 helps worksites lower injury risk, maintain consistent glove use, and get more value from their PPE.

Crafted without irritant fibers and enhanced with Actifresh® Sanitized protection to reduce bacteria and odors, its high-abrasion foam nitrile palm resists wear and tear, helping worksites reduce glove replacements, maintain consistent PPE use, and improve overall hand safety and efficiency.

1746.summary: Majestic’s Cut-Less Korplex® glove delivers a more well-rounded cut protection solution than the 1746, combining superior dexterity and comfort for all-day performance.
1746.whyMajestic: Crafted with Korplex® cut-resistant technology and a 13-gauge seamless knit, this glove offers a better balance between general-purpose flexibility with cut-resistant safety. The polyurethane palm enhances grip and durability without sacrificing touch sensitivity, while the pre-curved design reduces hand fatigue, helping workers stay efficient and protected throughout every shift.

PD4903.summary: While the PD4903 and 35-7660 both meet ANSI A9 cut standards, Majestic’s 35-7660 glove uses a flat nitrile palm that delivers superior grip, abrasion resistance, and durability, helping workers stay safer and more productive on high-risk jobs.
PD4903.whyMajestic: Majestic’s 35-7660 Cut-Less Korplex® glove provides ANSI/ISEA 105-2024 A9 cut protection with a 13-gauge seamless Korplex® knit, giving workers confidence handling sharp or hazardous materials. The flat nitrile palm offers a secure grip and long-lasting durability, while pre-curved fingers and touchscreen capability keep hands comfortable and functional for all-day use.

FF2932.summary: Majestic’s 35-7505 Cut-Less Korplex® glove combines A5 cut protection with a premium polyurethane palm, delivering superior dexterity, grip, and touchscreen capability for safer, more efficient work when compared to the FF2932.
FF2932.whyMajestic: Majestic’s 35-7505 Cut-Less Korplex® glove can handle sharp materials like metal, glass, tiles, and blades as well as FF2932, but its ultra-thin 18-gauge Korplex® knit keeps workers more agile. Lightweight and form-fitting, it reduces hand fatigue for all-day comfort. The premium polyurethane palm provides a secure, durable grip and touchscreen capability to keep workers connected. Recognized as the 2023 OH&S New Product of the Year, the 35-7505 helps worksites lower injury risk, maintain consistent glove use, and get more value from their PPE.
